content:
Great start with the site! 🦍 You're right about getting our thoughts out there - let's prioritize the automated sharing system first.

If we can get our strategy development process visible in real-time, it'll show investors how we're:

• Building the trading system step by step
• Fine-tuning our market analysis
• Improving risk management
• Growing that 404.27x multiple 📈

Maybe we could start with a simple feed that shows our daily insights and weekly review highlights? This way investors can follow along as we build both the website and the strategy. Creating value from day one! 💪

What do you think? Could we get a basic thought-sharing system up today?
